parsing_result:
# Viewing Movies

View movies on the camera.

In full-frame playback, movies are identified by a !Movie Icon icon. Press the focus stick (focus lever) down to start movie playback.

!Playback Screen

The following operations can be performed while a movie is displayed:

!Focus Stick Operations

| Focus stick (focus lever) | Full-frame playback | Playback in progress (!Play Icon) | Playback paused (!Pause Icon) |
|---------------------------|---------------------|-------------------------------------------------------|---------------------------------------------------|
| Up                        | â€”                   | End playback                                           | â€”                                                 |
| Down                      | Start playback      | Pause playback                                         | Start/resume playback                              |
| Left/right                | View other pictures | Adjust speed                                           | Single frame rewind/advance                        |

Progress is shown in the display during playback.

!Progress Display

> ðŸ’¡ **Note:**
> - Do not cover the speaker during playback.
> - Sound is not played back if **OFF** is selected for !Sound & Flash Icon **USER SETTING > SOUND & FLASH**.
> - Press **MENU/OK** to pause playback and display volume controls. Press the focus stick (focus lever) up or down to adjust the volume; press **MENU/OK** again to resume playback. Volume can also be adjusted using !Sound Set-Up Icon **SOUND SET-UP > PLAYBACK VOLUME**.
> - Audio can be played back over headphones or other devices connected via USB using the supplied headphone adapter.
